      • getAttribute

        public String getAttribute(String key)
                    throws GroupAttributeNotFoundException
        Get a group setting that is stored in the cache or in the XML settings (groups.xml)
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The value of the setting
        Throws:
        GroupAttributeNotFoundException - This is thrown if the setting can't be found.

      • canExecute

        public boolean canExecute(Command c)
        Can this group execute the command c This method will check the parent group as well if this group can't execute the command
        Parameters:
        c - The command to check
        Returns:
        Returns true if the group can execute the command
